fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Check 1 of the roles you recieved with your attribute, you will learn a random color in the Profile Picture of someone with that role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You learn a random alive role in the game every night, you cannot recieve the same one twice.
- Checking the same role again will give a different result if there are more colors/people.
- You will only recieve a single word for thr role's color. (Blue, Lime, Magenta.)
